cmd.name: German chamber
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to gain experience by learning from more experienced warriors
cmd.param: NamePlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NameSet, Ritual Chamber, default

cmd.name: German Wolf Summoning
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to sacrifice themselves and summon a wolf, which is under your control for about 3 minutes
cmd.param: ReqSet, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Wolf Summoning, default

cmd.name: German Eagle Summoning
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to sacrifice themselves and summon an eagle, which is under your control for about 2 minutes
cmd.param: ReqSet, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Eagle Summoning, default

cmd.name: German Mass Heal
cmd.description: Allows enchantresses to sacrifice themselves to heal nearby allies
cmd.param: ReqSet, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Mass Heal, default

cmd.name: German God's Gift
cmd.description: All new warriors are equipped with a God's Gift artifact, which heals a warrior at his first kill and then disappears
cmd.param: ReqSet, Ritual Chamber, default, NameSet, German God's Gift, default, SetsSet, items/God's Gift, 1

cmd.name: German God's Strength
cmd.description: All new warriors are equipped with a God's Strength artifact, which adds 50 max health
cmd.param: ReqSet, Ritual Chamber, default, NameSet, German God's Strength, default, SetsSet, items/God's Strength, 1
